resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108721</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108721</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1171488281</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">TakingITGlobal's Guide to Action</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anleitung TakingITGlobals zur Tätigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le guide de TakingITGlobal de l'action</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guia de TakingITGlobal à ação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guida del TakingITGlobal ad azione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">TakingITGlobal's οδηγός για την ενέργεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Guía de TakingITGlobal a la acción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">TakingITGlobal's Guide to Action is designed to help you turn your ideas and dreams into reality. The main guide and the three topical guides below are workbooks for you to download, use and share. The three topical guides are listed under their own entries in OER Commons.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>zh</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>fr</language>
          <language>pt</language>
          <language>ru</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anleitung TakingITGlobals zur Tätigkeit ist 
konzipiert, um Ihnen zu helfen, Ihre Ideen und Träume zu Wirklichkeit
zu machen. Die Hauptanleitung und die drei aktuellen Anleitungen
folgend sind Arbeitsbücher, damit Sie downloaden, verwenden und 
teilen. Die drei aktuellen Anleitungen werden unter ihren 
eigenen Einträgen in den OER Common ausgedruckt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le guide de TakingITGlobal de l'action est conçu 
pour vous aider à transformer vos idées et rêves en réalité. 
Le guide principal et les trois guides topiques ci-dessous sont 
des cahiers de travail pour que vous téléchargiez, à utilisez et 
partager. Les trois guides topiques sont énumérés sous leurs 
propres entrées dans des terrains communaux d'OER.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A guia de TakingITGlobal à ação é projetada 
ajudar-lhe girar seus idéias e sonhos na realidade. A guia 
principal e as três guias tópicas abaixo são manuais de 
instruções para que você download, usem-se e compartilhem-se. 
As três guias tópicas são alistadas sob suas próprias 
entradas em terras comuns de OER.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La guida del TakingITGlobal ad azione è destinata
per aiutarla a trasformare nelle vostri idee e sogni la realtà. 
La guida principale e le tre guide d'attualità sotto sono libri
di esercizi affinchè trasferiscano, da usare e ripartirsi. Le 
tre guide d'attualità sono elencate sotto le loro proprie entrate nei
terreni comunali di OER.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">TakingITGlobal's ο οδηγός για την ενέργεια 
σχεδιάζεται για να σας βοηθήσει να μετατρέψετε τις ιδέες και τα 
όνειρά σας σε πραγματικότητα. Ο βασικός οδηγός και οι τρεις
επίκαιροι οδηγοί είναι κατωτέρω εγχειρίδια για σας για να 
μεταφορτώσουν, να χρησιμοποιήσουν και να μοιραστούν. Οι τρεις
επίκαιροι οδηγοί παρατίθενται κάτω από τις καταχωρήσεις τους 
στις αστικές τάξεις OER.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La guía de TakingITGlobal a la acción se diseña
para ayudarle a dar vuelta a sus ideas y sueños en realidad. La
guía principal y las tres guías tópicas abajo son libros de trabajo
para que usted descargue, utilice y comparta. Las tres guías 
tópicas se enumeran bajo sus propias entradas en campos comunes de 
OER.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1171488281</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>zh</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>zh</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108721</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/guide-to-action</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
